mapper.insert: insert into posts (uid, title, sendtime , pcid, content) values (#{uid},#{title},now(),#{pcid},#{content});
mapper.select: select * from posts where pcid=#{pcid} limit #{start},10;
select posts.*,user.username,user.img from posts join user on user.uid=posts.uid where pid=#{pid};
select count(*) from posts where pcid=#{pcid};
